#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
/* 2d dp array for check that sum exits in array or not*/
int arr[100005],n;
int val;

int subsetSum()
{
	int dp[1001][1001];

	int sum = val;
	for(int i=0;i<=sum;i++)
	{	dp[0][i]=1;
		if(i)dp[i][0]=0;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=sum;i++)
	{

		for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
		{
			dp[i][j] = dp[i][j-1];
			if(i>=arr[j-1])
				dp[i][j] = dp[i][j] | dp[i-arr[j-1]][j-1];
		}
		
	}
	return dp[sum][n];

}
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
	scanf("%d",&n);scanf("%d",&val);
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
	}
	
	
	int x=subsetSum();
	if(x==1)
		printf("1\n");
	else printf("0\n");
}
	return 0;
}
